In autumn the most successful electronics artist Schiller of Germany with Symphonia publishes a unique work: The live recording of the Open air concert at the legendary gendarme's market in Berlin. The unique live event is quite a special premiere: First Schiller's doer Christopher von Deylen has performed the most striking songs of his long-standing creating together with a big symphony orchestra. Songs like "longing", Ã¢â‚¬Å“a nice dayÃ¢â‚¬Å“ or Ã¢â‚¬Å“The carillonÃ¢â‚¬Å“ were formed for this occasion musically completely anew - Schiller's electronic sound worlds hit on epic orchestra arrangements. In addition to the orchestra existing of more than 60 musicians Christopher von Deylen international guest artists has invited: Midge Ure (Frontmann of the British electronics pop pioneers Ultravox), which Swiss JaÃƒÂ«l as well as the Russian special soprano Eva Mali. Together with the count from Schiller has performed Unholy first the title song of Number one albums the sun live. Symphonia is a unique sound experience and a thrilling highlight in the creating of Schiller.
